Real Name: Diana
Special Powers
SUMMON MY INVISIBLE JET: Once per game, FREE: generate an Invisible Jet bystander.
CHAMPION OF THEMYSCIRA: Wonder Woman may start the game with any Wonder Woman Equipment equipped. // FREE: Remove an equipped Wonder Woman Equipment equipped to Wonder Woman from the game and don't score it. If you do, equip her with any other Wonder Woman Equipment from outside the game.

August 6, 2022
SuperClixer
The Card shows both the WW and JSA TA on it, but the LE I got only has the WW TA on the dial, and is missing the JSA TA on the dial. Poor quality control.
May 31, 2021
tidge
This may not be the most 'offensive' of the 50-point "Wonders" I think it offers enough to merit consideration of replacing the (top tier) HQ variant on JSA teams. The advantage I see for this piece is the added mobility (and protection) brought by the Invisible Jet, plus the ability to be equipped with something like the Golden Armor to provide a damage reducer on all clicks. It's also refreshing to see a JSA team member without a natural 18 defense value.
May 31, 2021
zharkman
At first i wondered: why would she have the same "free" as the items, to exchange with another, but then i figured, she cant give 2 times the same free, but her free to exchange them is not the same as the one from an object, would that be correct? Can i, say, start with the bracelets, then use the bracelets free to change into sword, charge and hit a character, then use her free to jump back ti the bracelets? Or is the ability just plain useless on her?
